name: trouble
chn: n. 问题, 困难, 麻烦; vt. 麻烦, 折磨, 使烦恼
example_en: She didn't want to trouble her parents with her problems.
example_cn: 她不想用自己的问题去麻烦父母。
memory_tips: 词源：来自古法语 'troubler'，意为搅乱。联想记忆：想象一个搅动的漩涡，象征着问题和困难。图像记忆：画一个被问题困扰的人，周围是混乱的漩涡。

image_prompt.main_image: A person sitting at a desk with a worried expression, surrounded by swirling clouds representing problems and difficulties.
image_prompt.example_image: A young woman hesitating to knock on a door, symbolizing her reluctance to trouble her parents with her problems.
